title: Beautiful brightly lit apartment in Pilsen!
posting_body: Top floor!
Make this beautiful unit your home!
2 bedroom, 1 bath apartment in a gorgeous all-brick building in the heart of Pilsen.
Parking included.
Brand new floors installed in 2019.
Amazing location one street over from Harrison Park and the National Museum of Mexican Art. 5 minute walk to the EL - Damen Pink Line (CTA).
A few blocks south of the bustling 18th Street!
Unit features high ceilings, huge windows with lots of light, big kitchen, shared backyard, and a designated parking spot included.
Easy street parking as well (Residential Permit Required).
New exterior staircase.
No on-site laundry.
Lots of laundromats within walking distance.
Central air and heat.
Move-in fee is a non refundable $600.
No security deposit.
Tenant responsible for gas and electric.
Last month's rent due at signing.
No smoking allowed.
Pet friendly - small pets allowed for an additional $45 per month.
Screening
- Credit and background check will be conducted
- Income must be ~3 times monthly rent
